message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, Bob!
I'll give you 400k, but you have to give me 600k. It's a fair compromise!
I'll give you a bit more, Bob, but I'm still looking for a fair deal!
I'll give you a bit less, but I'm willing to compromise. You can't have all the cake, Alice!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm getting closer to my goal, Alice. You're running out of time to make a better offer!
I'm taking control of the negotiations, Bob. This is my best and final offer!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm taking the last chance to make a fair deal. This is my final offer!
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm taking a risk, but I'm not going home with nothing!
You're really low-balling me now, Alice. I'm not going to accept this. You're going to leave with nothing.
I'm throwing in the towel, Bob. This is my last hope for a small share of the money.
